house_listing.house_description: GREAT ONE STORY HOME WITH SPLIT BEDROOM FLOOR PLAN. VERY LARGE DEN. ALL ROOMS ARE NICE SIZE. KITCHEN REMODELED IN 1997 WITH LARGE ISLAND. TILED FLOORS IN KITCHEN AND SEPARATE UTILITY ROOM. CHANDELIER IN DINING ROOM DOES NOT STAY. WILL BE REPLACED. SEPARATE STORAGE BUILDING AND WORKSHOP. AMENITIES INCLUDE SMOKE DETECTOR, CABLE, WINDOW COVERINGS.
